page.title: 15HEALTH -CAMELS' AREA
page.content: Our area is served by a Health Centre situated in Queen Camel. There are 3 doctors, 2 district nurses and a midwife, there is also a dispensary. The doctors generally see about 45 patients each a day. The district nurses give treatment in the Centre as well as covering a 10 mile radius to nurse the sick in their homes.These are mainly elderly patients who, because of advances in drugs and surgery, are now able to live longer than in the past. Activities are provided at the heatlh centre for both the elderly and the very young.The elderly have a luncheon club and the young,a Mother and toddler group.Adjacent to the health centre are warden supervised old people's bungalows.
